author: Leila Ettachfini, Michelle Garcia
title: Coronavirus Death Rates Are a Direct Result of Environmental Racism
description: Along with other forms of systemic inequality, environmental racism can cause many of the underlying conditions that make the virus particularly dangerous for black and brown communities.
content:
Last week, it became clear that communities of color from coast to coast are disproportionately being infected and dying from complications brought on by COVID-19. 
Weve known literally forever that diseases like diabetes, hypertension, obesity, and asthma a… [+6134 chars]
